text: Damien Meslot (born November 11, 1964 in Belfort) is a French politician and a member of The Republicans. He represented the Territoire de Belfort department at the National Assembly from 2002 to 2017. He served as mayor of Belfort since 2014. ==References== ==External links== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:People from Belfort Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Gaullism, a way forward for France Category:Mayors of places in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Damien Meslot
